course_description: This course is designed to introduce the first-year physical therapy students to the Guide to Physical Therapist Practice patient/client management model related to the examination and evaluation process. Preceptors will be expected to have advanced palpation skills and a thorough knowledge of surface anatomy. In addition, preceptors will be expected to have knowledge of the use of goniometers, inclinometers, and manual muscle tests. Preceptors will receive experience implementing the teaching-learning process in a small group laboratory format.
